Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 51st overall pick, by Cleveland in 1981...
Injured on 4/26/1981 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 8/24/1987, off Jeff Stember (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/7/1988, off Bill Gullickson (CHW)...
Injured on 6/17/1991 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Detroit on 8/16/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1993, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 9/6/1993...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1994...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/7/1996 to a 1-year deal worth $665,000 per year...
